column4: umm gparted livecd says that there is 931.51 gb of unallocated space (what happend to my install?) and if that is the case why doesnt it see the whole 1000GB?
sure I know that 1000gb != 1000 GB but I didnt think it would take 69gb away
it takes 24 bytes in every thosand
sounds like the partition table is gone
